name: Font
body: Font refers to both how big the letters are (can also be called font size), and how the letters look. For example, this document’s font is Calibri. A few other commonly used fonts: Times New Roman, Arial Black, Courier New.

name: Cursor
body: A symbol that looks like a capital “I”, indicates where the next character you type on your screen will appear. You use your mouse, touch screen, touch pad or the arrow keys on your keyboard to move the cursor around on your screen.
